attributes.action: Make sure the funding needed for NHS hospitals to run risk-free is available.
attributes.background: Our NHS system is struggling to keep up with demand for treatment of the British people. Many hospital are on red alert and lack the funding needed for smooth operation. The documentary "Hospital" on the BBC shows the risks associated with such incidents.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166959
